recommendations.title: Implement Meta-Tools Architecture
recommendations.description: Meta-tools approach reduces token usage by 70.9%, providing significant context window savings.

recommendations.title: Consolidate Jira Tools
recommendations.description: Jira service has 91 tools averaging 309 tokens each. Consider consolidation.

recommendations.title: Consolidate Confluence Tools
recommendations.description: Confluence service has 11 tools averaging 366 tokens each. Consider consolidation.
